definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to sew/to stitch together/to combine/to link/to connect/to put words together/to compose/to embellish

sentences.english: A representation form for marked proper-prefixed tree in GUI is given.
sentences.chinese: 并给出真前缀标记树的一种GUI表现方式。

sentences.english: Does Postfix operator really has a higher precedence than prefix?
sentences.chinese: 是否真的有比前缀，后缀式操作符的优先级更高？

sentences.english: The class names begin with a dot prefix.
sentences.chinese: 这些类名称以一个点前缀开始。

sentences.english: If you define an attribute without a prefix, then it does not have a namespace.
sentences.chinese: 如果您定义一个不带前缀的属性，则它没有名称空间。

sentences.english: Use prefixes that indicate the package or module.
sentences.chinese: 使用表明包或模块的前缀。

sentences.english: To avoid naming conflicts, you should use the namespace prefixes whenever possible.
sentences.chinese: 为避免命名冲突，您应尽可能随时使用名称空间前缀。

sentences.english: For a prefixed name, the local part is what comes after the colon.
sentences.chinese: 对于有前缀的名称，本地部分是冒号之后的部分。

sentences.english: The user points out that php adds a '_' to your prefixes.
sentences.chinese: 前缀和数组键名之间会自动加上一个下划线。

sentences.english: For it to be possible, the conditions have to form a leftmost prefix of an index.
sentences.chinese: 为了可能，条件必须以一个索引的最左前缀的形式。

sentences.english: I mentioned the potential variance caused by the choice of prefixes.
sentences.chinese: 我提到了前缀选择造成的各种可能的变化。

sentences.english: This will specify that you will prefix the character name later when referencing.
sentences.chinese: 稍后引用时这将指定你前缀字符名称。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 is with the prefix "a" analysis of derivative word recognition.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是对带前缀“阿”的派生词的识别分析。

sentences.english: Another common mistake is to confuse a prefix with an identifier.
sentences.chinese: 另一种常见的错误是混淆了前缀和标识符。

sentences.english: A prefix of cylindrical roller bearing codes identifies the design.
sentences.chinese: 一个前缀的圆柱滚子轴承代码标识设计。

sentences.english: There are at most four prefixes that are of syllabic in the formation.
sentences.chinese: 构形中的前缀最多的有四个是成音节的。

definition: to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
determiner (in grammar, i.e. article, demonstrative, possessive pronoun, noun genitive etc)
